Tested on Ubuntu 19.04. Instalattion time -> 40 min

- **Git** Required;
- **SSH** configured. `ssh-keygen -t rsa -b 4096 -C "sergiokopplin@gmail.com"`;
- **Chrome** Installed;

```
git clone https://github.com/sergiokopplin/.dotfiles.git ~/.dotfiles &&
cd ~/.dotfiles &&
./install
```

Gnome Extensions:
- Sync via Extensions Sync

---

Predator Helios 300 Graphic Card (driver 418 proprietary) fix:

```
Open the file.

sudo nano /lib/modprobe.d/nvidia-kms.conf

And comment out the the nvidia-drm modeset option.

# This file was generated by nvidia-prime
# Set value to 0 to disable modesetting
# options nvidia-drm modeset=1
```
